culprit.name: Issac Clarke
culprit.title: Engineer
culprit.description: Brilliant engineer aboard the cargo ship VOID

culprit.name: Amelia Earhart
culprit.title: Pilot
culprit.description: Cocky young pilot with a lot of promise

culprit.name: Ratatouille
culprit.title: Chef
culprit.description: Grumpy middle aged chef who hates being out in space.

culprit.name: Marice Leal
culprit.title: Biologist
culprit.description: Animal loving Biologist that will stop at nothing to stop animal cruelty.

culprit.name: Erick Vega
culprit.title: System Administrator
culprit.description: Care free system administrator who loves to talk about retro games.

culprit.name: Michael Jordan
culprit.title: Personal Trainer
culprit.description: Personal Trainer who used to be Earth's most dominating Shooting Guard in the NBA.

culprit.name: Bugs Bunny
culprit.title: Farmer
culprit.description: Carrot Enthusiast that loves bothering Elmer Fudd.

culprit.name: John Carmack
culprit.title: Programmer
culprit.description: Ships main programmer. Loves programming 3D graphics in his spare time.

culprit.name: Carlos Trianna
culprit.title: System Mechanic
culprit.description: Ships mechanic. Able to repair engines with nothing but a paper clip and some floss.

culprit.name: Marshall Mathers
culprit.title: Musician
culprit.description: Official Bard of the ship. Who knew you needed a musician in outer space.

culprit.name: Donald Drumpf
culprit.title: Negotiator
culprit.description: Expert Negotiator who always manages to make bad situations worse.

culprit.name: Jason Bourne
culprit.title: Covert Operative
culprit.description: Agent who is in charge of stealth missions. Teaches self defense classes in his spare time.

culprit.name: John Doe
culprit.title: Accountant
culprit.description: Manages the ships finances. But is jobless now that the Inventory system has been scrapped.

culprit.name: Jane Smith
culprit.title: Plumber
culprit.description: Fixes all of the plumbing systems on the ship. Graduated top of her class.

culprit.name: Maverick Jones
culprit.title: First Officer
culprit.description: Second in Command on the ship. Military background with a no nonsense attitude.

culprit.name: Ichabod Crane
culprit.title: Chief Inspector
culprit.description: Chief Inspector Officer. Loves mystery games and solving puzzles. Great interogator.

culprit.name: Louis C.K
culprit.title: Comedian
culprit.description: Ship's comedian. Puts on shows to improve overall crew morale.

culprit.name: LeBron James
culprit.title: Power Forward
culprit.description: Cleveland Cavelier's Small Forward. Best player in the NBA. Michael Jordan's rival.

culprit.name: Dwyane Wade
culprit.title: Shooting Guard
culprit.description: Aging Basketball player. Once was Miami's favorite player and taught LeBron how to win championships.

culprit.name: Hassan Whiteside
culprit.title: Center
culprit.description: Miami Heat's Center. Supposed to lead them back to playoff contention.

culprit.name: Steph Curry
culprit.title: Point Guard
culprit.description: Best 3-pt shooter of all time.
